explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, two women are sitting by a dining table. On the left sits a young woman with blue hair, wearing a blue top. She raises her left arm, resting a pink and black toy hammer on it. Her right hand rests on top of the hammer as she lowers her head slightly, smiling. On the right sits a middle-aged woman in a white top, with red hair. She looks forward, frowning slightly. A tablecloth with a floral pattern covers the table in front of them. The background is a well-decorated kitchen with wooden cabinets and chandeliers.

[0-3] The young woman with blue hair then touches the pink hammer on her left arm with her right hand. The middle-aged woman with red hair next to her reaches out with her left hand and slams the hammer hard. The blue-haired woman immediately places the hammer to her right, pouting and frowning as she looks forward.
